document_data.name: Fern-Frond Soup
document_data.mainbody: '''Fern-frond soup''' was a soup dish made in [[Faer√ªn]], using the fronds of a [[fern]].
document_data.Geography: The [[village]] of [[Dead Tree Hollow]] in [[the Vast]] was famous for its fern-frond soup. It also made a [[fiddlehead soup]] from younger plants.
